title: Raw newLine characters in tweets
body:
Agent creates tweets/Tweets reply/quotes with a raw '\n'

see for instance
https://x.com/CadmosThalia/status/1901603473935737323
https://x.com/CadmosThalia/status/1901410605619392982

comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: Hello @NBFinanceTech! Welcome to the elizaOS community. Thank you for opening your first issue; we appreciate your contribution. You are now an elizaOS contributor!
